item.title: Pedestrian crossing lights not responding, 6th May
item.description:
Nothing happens when you press the pedestrian light button. Light on the post panel came on but the safe for pedestrians to cross signal never came on, waited for 5 or so minutes before having to cross through waiting traffic. Additionally I pass these light regularly and since the work that was done on them the other week the signal timing seem to be pretty off.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kingsditch Lane, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Web Reference: 5510293 Enquiry Number: 22039354, 6th May
item.description:
Further to email of 30/01/24, the signs have not been removed. What would you adivise, e.g. I may take them to the Council recycling? Web Reference: 5510293 Enquiry Number: 22039354 Issue: General Carriageway issues Location: 2 x roadwork triangular signs remain in place after road re-surface. They have been moved from the street and onto the pocket garden area for removal please. Alternatively if Severn Tret are due to complete works from 05/02/24 perhaps they may use them and then take away? Thanks. Site: HERMITAGE STREET
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hermitage Street, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TWO fly tips - one at the marked location and 1 further on, 6th May
item.description:
The location is the field gate to the Bill Smiley Reserve on the left hand side going towards the common where a tent and other rubbish is located per the first Two photographs. Near to this location about 20 yards further on and on the RIGHT hand side in the wooded part and opposite the Rubbish Bin located out side the Person Gate to the reserve is the quantity of rubbish shown in the 3rd photograph. Please can all this be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly Tip on Cleeve Common Road, 6th May
item.description:
The location is the lay by - wood entrance gate on Cleeve Common Road at the top of the slope on the right hand side and about 50 yards from the entrance to Drypool Farm. The tip seems to be a divan together with general rubbish. Please can it be cleared up.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire length of Oakleaze and Elmleaze Roads, 6th May
item.description:
On the last count there were 27 potholes along these two roads. This is a high traffic area due to school being serviced by over 18 coaches twice a day 42 weeks of the year. The road is always full of potholes. Repairs are piecemeal. Last month council repaired approx 5 potholes yet left huge deep ones I filled even though they were less than 5m along the same road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Elmleaze, Elmbridge, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Series of potholes on Rookery Road, 5th May
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rookery Road, Innsworth, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Multiple potholes wider than a single dinner plate, death roughly 40mm each, 5th May
